summary: Over 5 years of experience in professional full-stack development specializing in Vue.js, modern web architecture, and 3D interactions. Strong software engineering skills with a focus on UI domain, proficient in analyzing and designing UI components with an emphasis on reusable components and subsystems.

Maintained DELL CED 2023 with C#, ASP.NET, and Bootstrap
